extensionDescription.message: Reopen the last closed tab.  Really nice when a tab is closed by mistake, or you decided you did not really want to close it moments too late.

undoCloseTabLabelOptionLabel.message: Do not show a list of recently closed tabs on the Undo Close Tab button.

undoCloseTabRestoreCount.message: How many to show in list.

undoCloseTabWindowTab.description: The menu label for when there is only two tabs in window.

undoCloseTabWindowTabs.description: The menu label for when there mutiple tabs in window.
